titleStmt.title: The Christians liue-loode Laid forth in a sermon vpon Math. 6. 33. By Samuel Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for William Butler, and are to be sold at his shop vnder S. Dunstanes Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Pages 65, 66 missing in number only; text unaffected.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
